description:
gotour: resolve ambiguous reference to PI

Some people were confused when math.Pi worked, but not math.PI.
Making this paragraph abstract helps.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go-tour.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=316215eb8cc8 ***

gotour: resolve ambiguous reference to PI

Some people were confused when math.Pi worked, but not math.PI.
Making this paragraph abstract helps.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 5311084: gotour: resolve ambiguous reference to PI
